price: Yeryüzünde böbürlenerek dolaşma. Çünkü sen (ağırlık ve azametinle) ne yeri yarabilir ne de dağlarla ululuk yarışına girebilirsin.
arabic: وَلَا تَمۡشِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَرَحًاۖ إِنَّكَ لَن تَخۡرِقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَلَن تَبۡلُغَ ٱلۡجِبَالَ طُولٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tamshi fī al-arḍi maraḥan innaka lan takhriqa al-arḍa walan tablugha al-jibāla ṭūlan
